Index.meta_title: Pixel Capture - Perfect screenshot tool with pixel-perfect precision.
Index.meta_description: Pixel Capture is a powerful browser extension that lets you capture screenshots with custom dimensions and pixel-perfect accuracy. Ideal for designers, developers and content creators.

Hero.description: Pixel Capture is a powerful browser extension that lets you capture screenshots with custom dimensions and pixel-perfect accuracy. Ideal for designers, developers and content creators.

Features.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of Pixel Capture
Features.section_description: Pixel Capture is a powerful browser extension that provides precise screenshot experience.
Features.feature1_description: Precisely control the width and height of your screenshots, customizing dimensions to your specific needs.
Features.feature2_description: Ensure every pixel is perfectly accurate, capturing exactly what you need, no more and no less.
Features.feature3_description: Capture screen content with just a few clicks, saving your valuable working time.
Features.feature4_description: Automatically save your screenshots to the cloud, easily access and manage all your historical captures.
Features.feature5_description: Support for PNG, JPG, WebP, and PDF export formats to meet different requirements.
Features.feature6_description: Synchronize your screenshots across different devices, accessing all your content anywhere, anytime.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Plan That's Right for You
Pricing.section_description: Whether you need basic screenshot functionality or advanced features like PDF exports, we have a plan for you.
